abstract.p: The Landen transformation$(a,b) \mapsto ((a + b)/2,\sqrt {ab} )$ preserves the value of an elliptic integral, and its iteration produces the classical arithmeticgeometric mean AGM(a,b). We present analogous transformations for rational functions integrated over the whole real line.
